# Roleplay Rule 3 - Do not validhunt
Do not go out of your way as a crew member to seek and harm antagonists without reason.
If an antagonist makes themself your proble, feel free to attack them.
## Examples
### Permitted
- Hunting an antagonist who is a direct threat to you, such as a traitor who previously tried and failed to kill you. - Hunting an antagonist who is a threat to the station, such as nukies, a dangerous heretic, a murderboning traitor, or a rampaging changeling. - Hunting an antagonist that security has failed to deal with. - Hunting any antagonist when most of security and command are dead.
### Not Permitted
- Hunting antagonists who pose no threat to you IC. - Searching for antagonists / antagonists bases for no reason IC. - Ignoring active round ending threats, such as active nukies.
